column4: hey, anyone has any idea why I wouldn't be able to connect to a perfectly fine hidden network to which I know and have inputted the settings? I'm on Karmic, and every time I try to connect to the hidden network I just made, the "connect" button is grayed out. why?
I've always had problems with hidden networks.  Gave up hiding the SSID in the end
but is there anything I can do? My gf is on Jaunty and it all works swell. Her dad is right over me with his Win7 laptop.
TheCheeze, here's my problem in detail, if you care: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1331405
